questions.question: Say which of the following sentences is grammatically correct.
Say which of the following sentences is grammatically correct.
answers: From the two he is clever.
From the two he is the cleverer.
He is the cleverer of the two.

questions.question: Say which of the following sentences is grammatically correct.
answers: From the three he is more clever.
He is the cleverer of the three.
He is the cleverest of the three.

questions.question: People often spend ………………………….. leisure in cinema theaters.
